IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidXMLBadVersion: Invalid Xml; can only parse elements of version one.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_WrongType: Operation on type %0 attempted with target of wrong type.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_NoQuoteChange: The QuotePrefix and QuoteSuffix properties can't be changed once an Insert, Update, or Delete command has been generated.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_MissingSourceCommand: The DataAdapter.SelectCommand property needs to be initialized.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_MissingSourceCommandConnection: The DataAdapter.SelectCommand.Connection property needs to be initialized;
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionUniqueValue: The %0.%1 is required to be unique, '%2' already exists in the collection.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionIsNotParent: The %0 with %1 '%2' is already contained by another %3.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionIsParent: The %0 with %1 '%2' is already contained by this %3.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionRemoveInvalidObject: Attempted to remove an %0 that is not contained by this %1.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionIndexInt32: Invalid index %0 for this %1 with Count=%2.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionIndexString: An %0 with %1 '%2' is not contained by this %3.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionNullValue: The %0 only accepts non-null %1 type objects.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CollectionInvalidType: The %0 only accepts non-null %1 type objects, not %2 objects.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_ColumnSchemaExpression: The column mapping from SourceColumn '%0' failed because the DataColumn '%1' is a computed column.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_ColumnSchemaMismatch: Inconvertable type mismatch between SourceColumn '%0' of %1 and the DataColumn '%2' of %3.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_ColumnSchemaMissing1: Missing the DataColumn '%0' for the SourceColumn '%1'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_ColumnSchemaMissing2: Missing the DataColumn '%0' in the DataTable '%1' for the SourceColumn '%2'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidSourceColumn: SourceColumn is required to be a non-empty string.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_MissingTableSchema: Missing the '%0' DataTable for the '%1' SourceTable.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidSourceTable: SourceTable is required to be a non-empty string
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidCommandType: The CommandType enumeration value, %0, is invalid.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidUpdateRowSource: The UpdateRowSource enumeration value, %0, is invalid.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_CommandTextRequired: %0: CommandText property has not been initialized
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_OpenConnectionRequired: %0 requires an open connection. The connection's current state is %1.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_TransactionConnectionMismatch: The transaction object is not associated with the connection object.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_TransactionRequired_Execute: Execute requires the command to have a transaction object when the connection assigned to the command is in a pending local transaction. The Transaction property of the command has not been initialized.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_TransactionCompleted: The transaction assigned to this command must be the most nested pending local transaction.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_OpenReaderExists: There is already an open DataReader associated with this Connection which must be closed first.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DeriveParametersNotSupported: %0 DeriveParameters only supports CommandType.StoredProcedure, not CommandType.%1
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_MissingSelectCommand: The SelectCommand property has not been initialized before calling '%0'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_FillSchemaRequiresSourceTableName: FillSchema: expected a non-empty string for the SourceTable name.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidMaxRecords: The MaxRecords value of %0 is invalid; the value must be >= 0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidStartRecord: The StartRecord value of %0 is invalid; the value must be >= 0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_FillRequiresSourceTableName: Fill: expected a non-empty string for the SourceTable name.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_FillChapterAutoIncrement: Hierarchial chapters columns must map to an AutoIncrement DataColumn.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresSourceTable: Update unable to find TableMapping['%0'] or DataTable '%0'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresSourceTableName: Update: expected a non-empty SourceTable name.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresCommandClone: Update requires the command clone to be valid.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresCommandSelect: Auto SQL generation during Update requires a valid SelectCommand.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresCommandInsert: Update requires a valid InsertCommand when passed DataRow collection with new rows.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresCommandUpdate: Update requires a valid UpdateCommand when passed DataRow collection with modified rows.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateRequiresCommandDelete: Update requires a valid DeleteCommand when passed DataRow collection with deleted rows.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateNullRowTable: DataRow does not belong to a DataTable.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UpdateMismatchRowTable: DataRow[%0] is from a different DataTable than DataRow[0].
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_RowUpdateErrors: %0: Errors occurred; no additional is information available.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidCommandTimeout: Invalid CommandTimeout value %0; the value must be >= 0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UninitializedParameterSize: Parameter %0: '%1' of type: %2, the property Size has an invalid size: %3
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_PrepareParameterType: %0.Prepare requires all parameters to have an explictly set type.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_PrepareParameterSize: %0.Prepare requires all variable length parameters to have an explictly set non-zero Size.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_PrepareParameterScale: %0.Prepare requires parameters of type '%1' have an explictly set Precision and Scale.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_ClosedConnectionError: Invalid operation. The connection is closed.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_NoConnectionString: The ConnectionString property has not been initialized.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_OpenConnectionPropertySet: Not allowed to change the '%0' property while the connection (state=%1).
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_EmptyDatabaseName: Database cannot be null, the empty string, or string of only whitespace.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidConnectTimeoutValue: Invalid 'Connect Timeout' value of '%0'. The value must be an integer >= 0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidPersistSecurityInfo: Invalid 'Persist Security Info' value of '%0'. The value must be a boolean of 'true' or 'false'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_PoolFull: Connection Pool has reached the maximum number of connections.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DataReaderNoData: No data exists for the row/column.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DataReaderClosed: Invalid attempt to %0 when reader is closed.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_StreamClosed: Invalid attempt to %0 when stream is closed.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DynamicSQLJoinUnsupported: Dynamic SQL generation is not supported against multiple base tables.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DynamicSQLNoTableInfo: Dynamic SQL generation is not supported against a SelectCommand that does not return any base table information.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DynamicSQLNoKeyInfo: Dynamic SQL generation for the %0 is not supported against a SelectCommand that does not return any key column information.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DynamicSQLReadOnly: Dynamic SQL generation for the %0 is not supported against a SelectCommand that does not return any modifiable columns.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_DynamicSQLNestedQuote: Dynamic SQL generation not supported against table names '%0' that contain the QuotePrefix or QuoteSuffix character '%1'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_NonSequentialColumnAccess: Invalid attempt to read from column ordinal '%0'. With CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess, you may only read from column ordinal '%1' or greater.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidDataType: The parameter data type of %0 is invalid.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UnknownDataType: No mapping exists from DbType %0 to a known %1.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_UnknownDataTypeCode: Unable to handle an unknown TypeCode of %0 with DataType of %0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_InvalidSizeValue: Invalid parameter Size value '%0'. The value must be greater than or equal to 0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_WhereClauseUnspecifiedValue: Parameter['%0'] contained within auto gen WHERE clause with SourceColumn '%1' has an unspecified Original value in the DataRow at column '%2'.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_TruncatedBytes: Error: byte array truncation to a length of %0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_TransactionZombied: This %0 has completed; it is no longer usable.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbConnection_InfoMessage: Event triggered when messages arrive from the DataSource.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbConnection_StateChange: Event triggered when the connection changes state.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbConnection_State: ConnectionState indiciating if the connection is open or closed.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_ConnectionStringTooLong: Connection string exceeds maximum allowed length of %0.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.Ifx_UnsupportedCommandTypeTableDirect: The Informix .NET Data Provider does not support CommandType.TableDirect
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.Ifx_CantSetPropertyOnOpenConnection: Can't set property on an open connection.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.Ifx_CantAllocateEnvironmentHandle: %0 - unable to allocate an environment handle.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxCommandBuilder_DataAdapter: The DataAdapter for which to automatically generate IfxCommands
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxCommandBuilder_QuotePrefix: The character used in a text command as the opening quote for quoting identifiers that contain special characters.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxCommandBuilder_QuoteSuffix: The character used in a text command as the closing quote for quoting identifiers that contain special characters.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.ADP_NonSeqByteAccess: Invalid %2 attempt at dataIndex '%0'. With CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess, you may only read from dataIndex '%1' or greater.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbCommand_CommandTimeout: Time to wait for command to execute.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbCommand_Transaction: The transaction used by the command.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbCommand_UpdatedRowSource: When used by a DataAdapter.Update, how command results are applied to the current DataRow.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_ConnectionString: Information used to connect to a Data Source.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_ConnectionTimeout: Current connection timeout value, not settable in the ConnectionString.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_Database: Current data source catalog value, 'Database=X' in the connection string.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_DataSource: Current data source, 'Server=X' in the connection string.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_ServerVersion: Version of the server accessed by the Informix driver.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxConnection_ServerType: Type of the server accessed by the Informix driver.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbDataAdapter_DeleteCommand: Used during Update for deleted rows in DataSet.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbDataAdapter_InsertCommand: Used during Update for new rows in DataSet.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbDataAdapter_UpdateCommand: Used during Update for modified rows in DataSet.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DataParameter_IsNullable: a design-time property used for strongly typed code-generation.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DataParameter_SourceColumn: When used by a DataAdapter.Update, the source column name that is used to find the DataSetColumn name in the ColumnMappings. This is to copy a value between the parameter and a datarow.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DataParameter_SourceVersion: When used by a DataAdapter.Update (UpdateCommand only), the version of the DataRow value that is used to update the data source.
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.DbDataParameter_Size: Size of variable length data types (string and arrays).
IFMX_MSG_STRINGS.IfxParameter_DirectionNotSupported: The HCL Informix .Net Data Provider does not support Output Parameters.
